Resource and property changes are indicated with this symbol:
  + Create

The deployment will update the following scope:

  + Microsoft.ApiManagement/service/diagnostics/applicationinsights [2023-03-01-preview]

      id:           "/subscriptions/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012/resourceGroups/rg-example/providers/Microsoft.ApiManagement/service/apim-example/diagnostics/applicationinsights"

      name:         "applicationinsights"
      properties.alwaysLog:             "allErrors"
      properties.httpCorrelationProtocol: "Legacy"

      properties.sampling.percentage:   100
      properties.sampling.samplingType: "fixed"
      properties.verbosity:             "information"
      type:         "Microsoft.ApiManagement/service/diagnostics"

Resource changes: 3 to create.
